title: Man dies after loader accident
text:
Man dies after loader accident Last updated 10:18, February 24 2017 
Emergency services were called at around 1.45am after reports of a worker being run over by a loader, police said. 
A man has died in an early-morning workplace accident at South Port, Bluff. 
Emergency services were called about 1.45am after reports of a worker being run over by a loader, police said. 
The 54-year-old man died at the scene a short time later. 
Worksafe NZ was investigating. 
South Port chief executive Mark O'Connor said the man was not a South Port employee. 
A Fire Service spokesman said while they were called to the incident, they were stood down before they arrived. 
More to come.
